title: (NEED HELP) Update Failed: Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information
body:
I cannot play league of legends. Everytime i try to open league it patches but close to the end it says Update Failed: Unspecified Error Occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
Can anyone please help????

replies.body: Are you modifying your client files, to play in a different language perhaps?  If that's the case, check [this out](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768-Updated-Client-Known-Issues#h2q6)
i still have this problem too riot can you help please, even after deleting the entire riot folder and redownloading it all there is no fix it is still broken i have no clue what to do now
I have also had this same issue. I have followed the uninstall guide to a T. Still haven't found a fix.

This is happening to me as well. I have never modified anything. I completely uninstalled and reinstalled and followed the steps here http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M/d/qGY56UB4 and it still isn't working....
